manpage:
&site;
This page contains links to the artefacts for the latest WebTest version, as well as for previous releases.
Release class = development, build number =
This snapshot represents the current stream of development.
All releases contain the same set of files. The primary artifacts of interest are:
webtest.zip
Currently not available for public download. You'll need to consult to build webtest from source.
Documentation
All documentation is served as GitHub pages. Includes the ant tasks manual, javadoc API, and self test results. They may be downloaded from https://github.com/DaveParillo/webtest/archive/gh-pages.zip
